caseStudies.title: CorkVision
caseStudies.context: Pre-revenue AI startup backed by AWS and NVIDIA needed their entire product built from zero. Joined as the second employee.
caseStudies.built: Cross-platform web and mobile applications with custom Business Intelligence dashboards, replacing expensive third-party solutions.
caseStudies.decisions: Wrote over 60% of the production codebase across web, mobile, and our web server. Designed monolithic service architecture for fast iteration. Built custom BI to eliminate AWS QuickSight dependency.
caseStudies.outcome: Saved $10-15K/month in recurring costs. Shipped to beta wineries. Led weekly client meetings to drive product roadmap.

caseStudies.title: PerfectLine
caseStudies.context: Saw a gap in quality programming education. Built a platform to deliver personalized, project-based C++ courses.
caseStudies.built: Production web application with personalized curriculum delivery, progress tracking, and student management. Handled 10-15 simultaneous clients.
caseStudies.decisions: Next.js for fast, SEO-friendly frontend. Firebase for real-time updates and simple auth. Project-based curriculum over theory-heavy approaches.
caseStudies.outcome: Taught data structures, OOP, and algorithm design. Managed all operations from curriculum planning to billing.

caseStudies.title: LuckyBeePress
caseStudies.context: Private web development contractor for local letterpress businesses.
caseStudies.built: Wholesale e-commerce website for local letterpress business client. Implemented a custom checkout flow and payment processing to cut costs.
caseStudies.decisions: Next.js for fast, SEO-friendly frontend. Firebase for real-time updates and simple auth. Project-based curriculum over theory-heavy approaches.
caseStudies.outcome: Cut down costs by 20% by using a custom frontend and backend instead of relying on a third-party solution.

caseStudies.title: BentoLabs
caseStudies.context: Noticed I was rebuilding the same foundational architecture for every new product. Created a solution.
caseStudies.built: Production-ready codebase automation tool with frontend component libraries for Flutter and Next.js, plus two backend options (Deno/Hono and Node/Express).
caseStudies.decisions: Modular architecture for flexibility. Terraform for infrastructure as code. Auth0 integration for secure, fast auth setup.
caseStudies.outcome: Saves 3-6 months of development time per new project. Battle-tested across multiple production applications.
